column1: Kata Robata////I wish I came here sooner!! Our server was Tai
column2: he is amazing. He knew his menu and made awesome suggestions and gave us amazing service. We started with the truffle Madai
column3: that was delicious. The chef sashimi platter for two
column4: the kobe skewers that melt in your mouth
column7: lobster Mac n Cheese (amazing but heavy) the green tea cheesecake and the blueberry soybean cake (yum!!!). Overall
column8: the experience and food was amazing
